content.en: Quantum-secured blockchains: Researchers are exploring how to develop quantum-secured blockchains to protect against threats from quantum computing. They are using algorithms based on Quantum Key Distribution (QKD) mechanisms and vote-based consensus algorithms to create a digital signature scheme. Additionally, they are investigating post-quantum cryptosystems and distributed ledger technologies to address the challenges of quantum computing in blockchain. These advancements aim to enhance the security and efficiency of blockchain systems and protect data and assets from quantum threats.
content.da: Kvantumsikrede blockchains: Forskere undersøger, hvordan man kan udvikle kvantumsikrede blockchains for at beskytte mod trusler fra kvantecomputing. De bruger algoritmer baseret på mekanismer for Kvante Nøgle Distribution (QKD) og konsensusalgoritmer baseret på afstemning for at skabe et digitalt signatursystem. Desuden undersøger de post-kvantum kryptosystemer og distribuerede hovedbogsteknologier for at imødegå udfordringerne fra kvantecomputing i blockchain. Disse fremskridt sigter mod at forbedre sikkerheden og effektiviteten af blockchain-systemer og beskytte data og aktiver mod kvantetruer.
